column4: anyone know why my resolution is set correctly but the display is not taking up the whole LCD? if I change the refresh rate to 75 HZ it takes up the whole LCD but my LCD says out of range?
look up your native resolution and frequencies
should be a native modeline in xorg
hmmm...what would it say? I don't think I have one
sure.... http://pastebin.com/d43f4a852   and where would the log be?
also, i'm finding different frequency ranges.. you're just a tad -- over could be the issue
take a look at this, and try adjusting your xorg.conf to this...http://www.geeks.com/details.asp?InvtId=G19LWK&cpc=RECOM  i'd still like to see your log though
yeah sorry didn't see it pasted earlier... also.. look at that log on line 279... it seems maybe you have the wrong BusID set? it's on line 66 of your conf file
a lspci | grep -i vga should show you the right pci port
I have "PCI:0:2:0" and the grep gave me 00:02.0  do I need to change it?
